entry.title: Elizabeth Warren: SEC 'Wrong on the Law' Over Bitcoin ETF Approval
entry.summary: The Senator claimed that the SEC had let crypto "burrow even deeper into our financial system," and pressed for AML rules.

entry.title: Generative Art Across Mediums: Artists Discuss the Evolving Space
entry.summary: In this panel discussion from Rug Radio's R Haus at Art Basel Miami 2023, Sofia Garcia, Ismail Tazi, Emily Edelman, and Aleksandra Art discuss the expanding generative art space—and why "generative" doesn't necessarily have to mean digital.

entry.title: OpenAI-Backed 1X Wants to Put a Humanoid Robot to Work in Your Home
entry.summary: The robotics company raised $100 million to build NEO, its second bipedal robot design that can perform domestic tasks.

entry.title: These Are All the Bitcoin ETFs That Are Now Trading in the US
entry.summary: Spot Bitcoin ETFs are finally trading in the United States following SEC approval. Here are all the Bitcoin ETFs you can invest in today.

entry.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preview: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: UPDATED: More and more signs are pointing to a release window for the Nintendo Switch 2. Here's the latest about Nintendo's next console.

entry.title: 'Gas Hero' NFTs Top Charts—But the 'Stepn' Maker's Game Is Blocked in the US
entry.summary: Gas Hero, the latest NFT game from Find Satoshi Lab, is blocking players in 16 regions around the world, including the United States.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Start With a Bang: $4.5 Billion on Day One of Trading
entry.summary: BlackRock stole the show, but Grayscale may have been the biggest winner. The crypto-native fund enjoyed its best day of trading ever.

entry.title: 'Axie Infinity' Caps SLP Token Supply—Can It Revitalize the Play-to-Earn Game?
entry.summary: Axie Infinity's SLP or Smooth Love Potion token is getting a rework, including a capped supply and a "stability fund" to support it.

entry.title: Pocket AI Gadget R1 Sells Out, Despite Social Media Snark
entry.summary: CES is all about AI this year, and a new device sold 10,000 units in one day—even though it was unclear what you were buying.

entry.title: How to Buy a Bitcoin ETF
entry.summary: What are Bitcoin ETFs? How do they differ from stocks and how can you buy one? Here’s everything you need to know.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Notch $1.9B in Trading Volume—But Merrill Lynch, Vanguard Won’t List
entry.summary: The newly approved Bitcoin ETFs reached $1.9 billion worth of volume by midday, with BlackRock and Fidelity leading the pack.

entry.title: Did You Forget to Pay Crypto Taxes? IRS Is Letting You Off the Hook—Kinda
entry.summary: The IRS is waiving penalties on unpaid taxes, crypto and otherwise, on 2020 and 2021 returns. Taxpayers have until March to make good.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Are Here—When Ethereum ETF?
entry.summary: After the historic approval of a spot Bitcoin ETF on Wednesday, analysts say a spot ETH ETF could be imminent.

entry.title: Bitcoin Nears $49,000 for First Time Since 2021 as ETFs Start Trading
entry.summary: The spike comes as spot Bitcoin ETFs launch on Wall Street for the first time ever, following Wednesday's long-awaited SEC approval.

entry.title: Got a Solana Saga Before They Sold Out? Here Are All the Airdrops You Can Claim
entry.summary: UPDATED: Solana Saga owners keep racking in the perks, including valuable Saga Monkes NFTs and SAMO tokens. Here's everything you can claim.

entry.title: Fortnite Players Can Still Claim Part of a $245 Million Settlement—Here's Who Is Eligible
entry.summary: UPDATED: Epic Games is paying out nearly a quarter of a billion dollars in refunds to Fortnite players, and the deadline for filing claims has now been extended.

entry.title: Bitfinity Aims to Enhance Bitcoin Ordinals With An Ethereum Virtual Machine On ICP
entry.summary: Bitfinity unveils a plan to integrate EVM with the Bitcoin blockchain, targeting DeFi services.

entry.title: Bitcoin Tops $47,000 Following U.S. ETF Approval
entry.summary: Bitcoin surged to $47,000 Thursday morning, after the SEC approved multiple U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs Wednesday.

entry.title: AI and Quantum Computing Flagged As New Global Risks: WEF
entry.summary: The World Economic Forum warns that artificial intelligence could adversely impact healthcare, information integrity, and labor markets.

entry.title: Ethereum ETF Hopes Push ETH Up 8% to Over $2,600
entry.summary: Optimism that a spot Ethereum ETF will follow close on the heels of multiple Bitcoin ETF approvals has propelled ETH to an 18-month high.

entry.title: 'You Betrayed Us': Voice Actors Denounce SAG-AFTRA's AI Gaming Deal
entry.summary: SAG-AFTRA signed a deal allowing one studio to make AI voice replicas of its union members. But many voice actors aren't happy.

entry.title: McAfee Claims Its Audio Deepfake Detection Tool Is 90% Accurate
entry.summary: Project Mockingbird was built to detect sophisticated AI-generated audio fakes amid growing global concern over digital authenticity.

entry.title: SEC 'Squandered a Decade' Rejecting Bitcoin ETFs: Commissioner Hester Peirce
entry.summary: Spot Bitcoin ETFs will start trading Thursday, but one crypto-friendly SEC Commissioner says it's a day far too long in coming.

entry.title: Degens Are Already Trading 'Bitcoin ETF' Meme Coins—On Solana
entry.summary: Solana traders are jumping on the Bitcoin ETF news. The meme tokens, unsurprisingly, crashed shortly thereafter.

entry.title: Ordinalized Again: Gensler's Bitcoin ETF Retreat Immortalized As Inscription
entry.summary: The Bitcoin blockchain permanently commemorates another historic moment: the SEC chair’s Bitcoin ETF approval statement.

entry.title: ‘Circumstances Have Changed’: Gary Gensler Relents on Bitcoin ETFs
entry.summary: SEC Commissioner Caroline Crenshaw decried the approval of Bitcoin ETFs, calling out inconsistent decision-making and risks.

entry.title: People Rank Open Source AI Output Better Than Commercial Plays
entry.summary: Mistral AI's Mixtral takes top honors among closed, proprietary options like Claude and ChatGPT.

entry.title: Bitcoin Dips, Then Bounces After ETF Approval While Ethereum Tops $2,500
entry.summary: Bitcoin's price action has been choppy since the SEC officially approved spot ETFs in the United States, while Ethereum hit an 18-month high.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Granted SEC Approval in Historic Action
entry.summary: After more than a decade of rejections, the SEC has at last given its blessing to allow Bitcoin ETFs to begin trading in the U.S.

entry.title: Twitter Gives Up on NFT Profile Pics, Killing Ethereum Feature for Paying Users
entry.summary: Two years after letting subscribers equip owned NFTs, Elon Musk’s Twitter (aka X) has axed the feature for subscribers.

entry.title: It Wasn't a Draft Tweet: SEC Taps FBI to Investigate Fake Bitcoin ETF Post
entry.summary: Speculators had previously guessed the fake post, which rattled markets yesterday, was a real SEC tweet that was published prematurely.

entry.title: Twitch, Unity Layoffs Keep Grim Gaming Industry Trend Alive in 2024
entry.summary: Gaming firms have already revealed over 2,000 job cuts in 2024, with Unity and Twitch leading the way on layoffs. It's more of the same from last year.

entry.title: Solana Saga Owners Got a Free NFT—Now They’re Selling for Over $1,000
entry.summary: Saga Monkes NFTs were airdropped free to Solana Saga owners this week, and they’re already selling for more than the phone itself.

entry.title: ‘Bitcoin Has No Value’: JP Morgan’s Jamie Dimon Says as Market Awaits ETF
entry.summary: Despite his bank being a participant in a Bitcoin ETF, Dimon asserts Bitcoin is primarily used for illegal activities.

entry.title: Bitcoin Rebounds as Brokerages List ETF After Traders 'Sold the News' on Fake Approval
entry.summary: By midday on Wednesday, investors started sharing screenshots of eTrade and Fidelity showing that Bitcoin ETF tickers were already being listed.

entry.title: The AI Coin to Rule Them All with Mike Grantis
entry.summary: Reza is joined by Mike Grantis from Contango Digital to discuss - The AI coin to rule them all - The Solana Ecosystem - What's next for Solana airdrops

entry.title: Conversation With Snowfro: Bringing 'Chromie Squiggle' #8107 to the Physical Space
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO and "Chromie Squiggle" project creator Erick "snowfro" Calderon spoke with Benny Redbeard Gross at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel 2023, to discuss how and why "Chromie Squiggle" NFT #8107 was given a special edition print run in collaboration with Avant Arte.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Deadline Looms: It's 'All Systems Go', Say Analysts
entry.summary: Analysts say they expect the SEC to put out a statement—an official one, this time—late in the afternoon on Wednesday.

entry.title: Don't Underestimate Mobile Gaming: Qualcomm's Matthew Grossman
entry.summary: Qualcomm product marketing manager Matthew Grossman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why mobile esports is exploding in popularity around the world—and dispels some of the misconceptions around mobile gaming.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: This Is the 'Calm Before the Storm', Says ETF Analyst
entry.summary: Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas joins Farokh Sarmad, Michael Anderson, and Ovie Faruq on the FOMO Hour to share the latest intel on the looming approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF, what might happen when the very different worlds of TradFi and crypto collide, and his insights on “Genslish,” the unique and strategic language of SEC chair Gary Gensler.

entry.title: Losing 1500 BTC on Mt Gox and the Problem with Women in Web3
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Brooke Lacey!
They discuss: - Making and losing generational wealth - Trauma Bond - Women in Web3 - The Problem with WAGMI

entry.title: ESL Faceit Group Exploring Blockchain 'Opportunistically,' Says Exec
entry.summary: Sam Braithwaite—ESL Faceit Group's VP of Game Ecosystems, Mobile, and Snapdragon Pro Series—shares the esports firm's approach to blockchain technology with GG's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Bryan Johnson Explains His Quest for Immortality and Why He Started with the Penis
entry.summary: Billionaire biohacker Bryan Johnson shared with Decrypt's Jason Nelson why he began his longevity quest and how technology has shaped the endeavor. Johnson also discusses some of his controversial experiments.

entry.title: Wildcard's Plans for 2024 with Founders Paul and Katy Bettner
entry.summary: Wildcard developers Paul and Katy Bettner tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about why they see their game as a "Web3 game," not a crypto game, and share why they've stuck with their initial vision despite the challenging broader market.

entry.title: Decrypt and Rug Radio Merge to Create Global Web3 Publishing Company
entry.summary: Decrypt and Rug Radio have announced their intent to merge, creating the world’s biggest decentralized publishing company. Codenamed [REDACTED], the alliance is aimed at revolutionizing tech-media, bringing together the forces of content creation and consumption.

entry.title: 'If You Play Well, You're Gonna be Rewarded': How FPS Web3War is Bringing 'Skill-to-Earn' to Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: Roll1ng Thund3rz co-founder Valentin Cobelea and Zilliqa CEO Matt Dyer joined Decrypt to discuss how the new FPS game Web3War is shaking up the crypto gaming space with a novel "skill to earn" mechanic that rewards players for high-quality gameplay.
